explains: v. 叙述，说明；重数，重新清点（选票）
n. 重新计算，重点选票；叙述，说明

sentences.en: It would take more energy to recount the votes.
sentences.cn: 重新计票需要耗费更多的精力。

sentences.en: The defeated candidate demanded a recount.
sentences.cn: 落选的候选人要求重新计票。

sentences.en: She was asked to recount the details of the conversation to the court.
sentences.cn: 她被要求向法庭陈述谈话细节。
